title: Login as Club admin
custom_preconds:
(username/password: (Test-SD-admin@mlb.com/western@WEDGE)

Given the user has navigated to the test url
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters the correct credentials 
AND clicks Log In
custom_expected:
THEN the user will successfully log in 
AND the home dashboard will display

title: Go to (Minor League) Pro Player Profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Club user is logged in
AND the Club user is viewing their Club's (Minor League) Roster Widget
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the Player Name Hyperlink for a player
custom_expected: THEN (Minor League) player's Profile should open in the same window

title: Open 7 Day DL tx from Create New
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has navigated to a (Minor League) Pro Player Profile
custom_steps:
WHEN user opens Create New modal from Player History widget
AND user selects "Minor" radio button on modal
AND user selects "Transactions" from first level dropdown 
AND user selects "Disabled List" from second level dropdown
AND user selects "Place on 7 Day DL" from third level dropdown
custom_expected: THEN system should open a new, preliminary Place on 7 Day DL transaction in edit mode

title: Submit 7 Day DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has opened a new, preliminary Place on 7 Day DL tx from create new on a (Minor League) Pro Player Profile
AND user has filled out all required fields on the form
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks submit
custom_expected:
THEN system should run all on_submit rule checks 
AND once all rule checks have been passed or overridden system should submit the tx to BOC for approval
AND system should update the status of the tx to submitted
AND system should display blue successful save notification
AND system should generate an approvals item for BOC

title: Login as BOC Approver
custom_preconds:
(username/password: test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD)

Given the user has navigated to the test url
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters the correct credentials 
AND clicks Log In
custom_expected:
THEN the user will successfully log in 
AND the home dashboard will display

title: Open 7 Day DL tx from Pending Approvals Widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC approver user is logged in
AND a club user has submitted a Place on 7 Day DL tx to BOC for approval
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Pending Approvals widget on the Clipboard
custom_expected:
THEN the approval item for the 7 Day DL tx should be populated on the Pending Approvals widget 
AND "Type" should be a hyperlink to the submitted 7 Day DL tx
AND clicking "Type" hyperlink should open the submitted 7 Day DL tx in the same window

title: Click Approve on 7 Day DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC user is viewing a submitted Place on 7 Day DL tx for a (Minor League) player 
AND all required fields on the form are populated
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Approve" on the tx
custom_expected:
THEN system should run all on_approve rule checks
AND once all rule checks have passed or been overridden system should update the tx status to "Approved"
AND successful Approval Notification should display
AND any clipboard items associated with the tx should be removed
AND new entry in black font should display for Place on 7 Day DL tx in player's Player History

title: Click Reject on 7 Day DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC user is viewing a submitted Place on 7 Day DL tx for a player 
AND all required fields on the form are populated
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Reject" on the tx
custom_expected:
THEN system should run all required field and formatting checks and display any relevant error or warning messages
AND the transaction status is updated to "Rejected"
AND successful reject notification #78 is displayed
AND item is removed from the approvals clipboard
AND player's pending Major League Roster status is reversed
AND pending player history entry is removed

custom_preconds:

title: Open (Minor League) 60 Day DL tx from Pending Approvals Widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC approver user is logged in
AND a club user has submitted a (Minor League) Place on 60 Day DL tx to BOC for approval
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Pending Approvals widget on the Clipboard
custom_expected:
THEN the approval item for the (Minor League) 60 Day DL tx should be populated on the Pending Approvals widget 
AND "Type" should be a hyperlink to the submitted (Minor League) 60 Day DL tx
AND clicking "Type" hyperlink should open the submitted 60 Day DL tx in the same window

title: Click Approve on (Minor League) 60 Day DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC user is viewing a submitted (Minor League) Place on 60 Day DL tx for a player 
AND all required fields on the form are populated
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Approve" on the tx
custom_expected:
THEN system should run all on_approve rule checks
AND once all rule checks have passed or been overridden system should update the tx status to "Approved"
AND successful Approval Notification should display
AND any clipboard items associated with the tx should be removed
AND new entry in black font should display for (Minor League) Place on 60 Day DL tx in player's Player History

title: Click Reject on (Minor League) 60 Day DL tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC user is viewing a submitted (Minor League) Place on 60 Day DL tx for a player 
AND all required fields on the form are populated
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Reject" on the tx
custom_expected:
THEN system should run all required field and formatting checks and display any relevant error or warning messages
AND once all rules have passed system should update transaction status to "Rejected"
AND successful reject notification (message #78) should be displayed
AND item should be removed from Approvals Clipboard
AND player's pending Major League Roster status should be reversed
AND pending Player History entry should be removed
AND any action items regarding the transaction should be removed

custom_expected: THEN system should open the player's Pro Player Profile

title: Find player currently on (Minor League) Disabled List
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club user is logged in

AND current date is on or after Earliest Reinstatement Date from (Minor League) player's most recent DL tx

custom_expected: THEN system should open the (Minor League) player's Pro Player Profile
